job_details.degree_required: Bachelor of Science/MS/PhD Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Finance or Related Field (or equivalent expertise)

jd: From: vandana, CCIT vandana@ccitinc.com Reply to: vandana@ccitinc.com Hi,Hope you are doing well! Requesting you to please have a look on below requirement and let me know your interest. If you find yourself comfortable with the required skills kindly, share your updated resume and let me know the best time for a quick discussion. Only MD local candidate with local ID .. Senior Business Analyst - MS DynamicsLocation: Rockville, MD Hybrid work mode Here we seek a seasoned Business/business systems analyst from Healthcare/government domain and worked on MS dynamics CRM configuration projects with Azure devops environment. 2+ years of MS dynamics project experience, good at communication. Job Description:Experience as a (12+ years) Business Analyst on software projects in supporting requirement analysis, documenting functional and technical requirements,Experience working on MS Dynamics projects Adept at requirement gathering, turning functional requirements into technical specificationsStrong ability to communicate effectively with technical and non-technical team and users.Experience handling Healthcare data Experience working in Azure DevOps environment Experience configuring MS dynamics Able to triage change requests, incidents during all phases of design, development, testing and training.Strong analytical and creative problem-solving skillsExcellent communication skillsExperience in government and/or healthcare domain is strongly preferredEducation:Bachelor of Science/MS/PhD Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Finance or Related Field (or equivalent expertise) Thanks & Regards,Vandana Technical Recruiter vandana@ccitinc.comCCIT, Inc |Empowering Enterprise eBusinesswww.ccitinc.com | 115 N Center St, Suite 202, Northville, MI - 48167
